name: MoonWhite
description:
Moon White is a short and easy action game featuring Chinese Kungfu. It tells about a journey how two elves compete with each other, looking for the harmony of traditional dance in each movement and posture.


Features
* Up to 48 postures with different pace and speed to explore.
* Low difficulty and no health point. Try any times if you want.
* Feel different seasons in the three different levels.


Rules
* Play the role of Luna to respond Blanc's continual movement and action.
* Press the guard key at the perfect time to resolve the difficulty.
* The more combo you get, the higher stage you will reach.
